Posts.Content: Hello:  My friend is 50, she was initially diagnosed with lung cancer stage iv, but did well for several months. Recently she was diagnosed with CM. She has lost feeling in her face, blurred vision, headaches, has diffuculty eating and swallowing. She just finished a series of full radiation to the brain and then will decide what next course of treatment will be...standard vs. alternative. Looking for any suggestions on successful treatment of this awful disease.   Thank you.
Posts.Title: Treatment for: carcinomatous meningitis
